Buttontimer.description: So that the user takes the time to read the message and does not accidentally click the buttons, they are deactivated for a certain time and only reactivated after expiry. This time can be adjusted here for the various windows. Specified in seconds. If no values are set via the profile, the default values are used aim Script.

buttontimer_Final_Message.title: Timer für Buttons Final Message
buttontimer_Final_Message.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Final User Info' are activated and the user can click on them so that the user has enough time to read the message. Specified in seconds.

buttontimer_pleaseWait_new.title: Timer für Buttons Please Wait
buttontimer_pleaseWait_new.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Please Wait Message' are activated and the user can click them so that the user has enough time to read the message and the message within it? This informs the user that they should please be patient. Specified in seconds.

buttontimer_pleaseWait_alt.title: Timer für Buttons Please Wait
buttontimer_pleaseWait_alt.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Please Wait Message' are activated and the user can click them so that the user has enough time to read the message and the message within it? This informs the user that they should please be patient. Specified in seconds.

buttontimer_ErrorMessage.title: Timer für Buttons Error Message
buttontimer_ErrorMessage.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Error Message' are activated and the user can click on them so that the user has enough time to read the message and the message within it? This informs the user that something has gone wrong. Specified in seconds.

Messanges.description: Definition of the messages for the standard message, error message, etc. Please specify the complete messages in the respective language carefully. The following variables can be used: %REAL_NAME% | %CURRENT_DEFERRAL_VALUE% | %forceInstallLocalDateTime% These are replaced in the script with the respective variables in the script
